data.title: Top 40 Wedding Venues in Oregon
data.meta_description: Find your perfect wedding venues in Oregon at Zola. We'll help you narrow down your venue search in minutes.
data.text:
Overlooking the Willamette Valley, the Oregon Garden Resort is a beautiful, serene venue perfect for your special day, be it a destination wedding, commitment ceremony, elopement or vow renewal. Our outdoor venue provides the perfect setting to say 'I Do'! Perfect for spring and summer ceremonies and receptions, our Wedding Garden offers a romantic outdoor setting to exchange rings in a charming white gazebo. This intimate garden, located just steps away from the Resort, features a manicured lawn leading to a charming white gazebo surrounded by flowers. Perfect for year-round ceremonies and receptions, our elegant Orchid Ballroom features a built-in bar, copper ceiling, and french doors that open to the Wedding Garden. The Orchid Ballroom offers an elegant atmosphere perfect for dancing the night away with your friends and family! Both venues can accommodate both ceremonies and receptions, so you can customize the best option for you.

For a special day infused with the spirit of creativity and culture, consider the Walters Cultural Arts Center for your wedding day! With its classic red-stone architecture, stained glass features, custom woodwork ceiling arches, concert-quality sound system, and fine art gallery, the Walters is one of the west side’s most treasured sites for wedding ceremonies, receptions, and other special events. Whether you’d like an intimate family reception for 40 guests, an extravagant party for 200, or an outdoor reception on the lawn, the Walters provides a variety of amenable and affordable options for your big day. Located in the heart of Hillsboro’s historic downtown, this former church is a bustling nexus of cultural activity. Our facility is open Monday through Friday, with private rentals available on Saturday & Sunday.

YOUR WEDDING, YOUR WAY Whether you want to exchange vows encircled by majestic evergreens or in our charming historic chapel/sanctuary, Camp Colton has the place for you. Located in the foothills of the Pacific Northwest's Cascade Range, our site strikes the perfect balance between natural beauty and rustic elegance. Take frame-worthy photos in front of our picturesque waterfalls, creeks or pond, host your reception dinner in our elegantly-appointed Gathering Hall, and dance the night away under the stars at our outdoor dancefloor & bar. SPEND THE NIGHT Our Weekend Wedding Package gives you exclusive use of our entire campus, which includes a luxurious honeymoon suite with outdoor clawfoot creekside tub, a tiny home overlooking our pond, rustically-elegant cabins that sleep 1-12, yurts and ample camping and RV space. Hike our lush trails, fall asleep to the sound of the babbling creeks that bisect our grounds, and wake to your new life together!

Nestled in the trees on Parrett Mountain, our wine tasting room is a cozy, inviting lodge-style experience. Drink wine by the fire or sit outside for a fantastic view of Mt. St. Helens between the trees. Construction of the building incorporated Cedar, Fir, and Maple harvested from our property. This wood was used for the siding, along with the 3 bars: Cedar, Fir and Maple live edge slabs. At the center of the building stands the top of the Cedar tree, standing 28 feet tall. Specializing in Big Bold Reds, we also have some award-winning Pinot Noir and white wines as well as local beer on tap. Our tasting room is a versatile space for hosting many events: private tastings, meetings, birthdays, small casual weddings, and more. Events must be catered. We have preferred caterers but will consider outside caterers as requested. We can seat 64-70 people inside and on the patio, but allow a maximum of 85 guests per event. We have 45 parking spots and 2 Tesla Charging stations.

Our location is on 12.6 acres of land on the Little Applegate River. The property is home to a small winery and tasting room, Wild Wines, and residents. The wedding ceremony location is perched above the river under the shade of large cedar and oak trees, but you may also choose your preferred location anywhere on the property. The celebration area is around the winery where the bar and bathroom can be accessed and where food service and seating can be set up, as well as electricity. As we are primarily an outdoor venue, we ask that you please keep this in mind before requesting to connect. Depending the time of year, you may require a tent for shade or rain protection. This is not something we provide, but we are happy to refer you to local outfitters. The main indoor area is the tasting room, seen in photos, which is best suited for the bar area, hors d'ouevres, gifts, cake service. Some of the outdoor area has shade available.

The Troutdale House boasts rustic charm while maintaining flexibility and 5-star customer service for their clients. Located in downtown Troutdale, Oregon, it is a convenient location for guests only 20 minutes from Portland and right off I-84. The Troutdale House offers seven different ceremony options with two of the outside options being covered and heated so you can married outside year-round. Other amenities include two dressing rooms, tables, chairs, linens, decorations, onsite staff, and so much more! We only host one event a day and with 10-hour blocks of time, you will have more than enough time to set up, get ready, and host your event! Clean-up at the end of the night is a breeze, just pack out what you brought in, throw your garbage away, and we'll do the rest! The Troutdale house provides so much that it is impossible to list it all in this little description. Visit our website for extra information, and then reach out and schedule your tour today!

La Bastide sets surrounded by stone walls and features stately firs bordering vistas of grapes fading to glorious sunsets. We are located just outside the charming hamlet of Silverton (home to Oregon Gardens) making us easily accessible from both Portland and Salem. Our Country Estate property invokes the warmth of welcome, intimacy of homecoming and sheer delight found in gathering together. With the first turn down our country road, you will be intrigued! Some appealing highlights include: - Warm ambiance in a woodland setting with spectacular sunsets and vineyard vistas - Unique opportunity to personalize with quality Vendors of choice - Privacy and seclusion with only one event scheduled per day - Designated, easily accessible spaces for Catering and Bar Service. - Parking for as many as 200 guests (accommodations for those with limited mobility) - Spectacular backdrops for photographs

Wilson Farm offers a lovely and unique venue for your wedding or special event. Lush farmland and forest surround a timeless and rustic working farm offering an elegant and natural backdrop for your celebration. Recite your vows in a flowered meadow or have your first dance in front of the stone crofters cottage. Feast in the timber-framed covered pavilion or capture unique photos at the barn with antique cars, tractors, or livestock. Specializing in small events, we work to ensure that your day is intimate and memorable, beautiful and joyous.

Aurora Vineyards is a wedding venue in Aurora, OR, just 25 minutes from Portland and Salem that offers both indoor and outdoor setting options to host your wedding. You will have an array of backdrops to choose from, from the picturesque gardens to the rustic, yet modern, event center, to bring your wedding vision to life. You will be welcome to start your day in the onsite get-ready suites, where you can prepare for your ceremony alongside your wedding party. After you exchange your vows in the tiered amphitheater, your guests can enjoy cocktail hour on the covered patio. For your reception, the event center's indoor space features an open floor plan for you to create any seating arrangement you prefer. Elegant chandeliers and large, accordion glass doors surround the room, creating a bright, airy atmosphere for you to dine and dance the night away.

This versatile venue can host an array of events ranging from intimate elopements, micro weddings to extravagant celebrations, with its capacity for up to 300 individuals. The location boasts private beaches and woodland lawn areas at which couples can exchange their vows or host a reception. The sand-filled sites are an ideal choice for couples who wish to host a waterfront wedding. Couples can also hold their ceremony in one of the more wooded areas, which exude a tranquil and intimate atmosphere. The following venues can be utilized for wedding events: Arch Rock Main Lawn Byrdie's Beach Lawn, Mervue Estate, Lookout house, Sandstone Point and Cove beach. Crook Point boasts eight vacation homes that are nestled on the western portion of the family's 3,000-acre retreat. Our lodging quarters combined can accommodate 44 comfortably with a maximum of 62 overnight guests. These beautiful seaside homes are ideal for wedding parties and guests who are staying for an extended period of time.

We are an event space with a harmonious blend of chic elegance & rustic ambiance surrounded by our beautiful Christmas tree farm. We want your event at Redland Family Farm to be as unique as you are, so we allow you to choose your vendors, the flow of your event, and you can customize where each moment is captured with the great variety of spaces, all included in your wedding package. With our beautifully renovated indoor and outdoor spaces, in our stunning farm setting, you can fully customize your event to fit your personality and vision. Our Wedding Package includes 12 hrs the day of + 2 hrs for a rehearsal and full use of the farm - no other events will be on site for weddings. We also include a staff on site to help with logistics and keeping our spaces clean and tidy. We host all types of events - weddings, corporate events, showers, graduation, birthday, retirement parties, company picnics, fundraisers and more!

A modern, industrial private dining venue located at 1203 NW Glisan Street in the heart of the Pearl District. Our expansive space features a state of the art open-view kitchen, floor to ceiling windows that open to the bustling neighborhood, and a wide variety of included amenities. From the creators and founders of Hunt & Gather Catering, offerings include seasonal menus options showcasing Pacific Northwest cuisine with international influences. We work hard to not only create the experience you request but create one that exceeds expectations at every moment.

The Barn at Countryside is the perfect countryside backdrop for your most memorable moments. The wedding barn has been re-designed as a rustic yet modern barn to give it that updated style and has all the modern amenities. On this 260 acre farm, you will find privacy, beautiful grounds, ample room for your guests, indoor and outdoor ceremony sites, a bridal suite and grooms quarters and plenty of parking. There are also 2 garden sites for outdoor ceremonies; an east garden giving you a breathtaking view of Mt. Hood and the west garden, a more intimate garden area which has spectacular Oregon sunsets. Accommodations for your guests can be easily obtained just minutes away as we are located just off of I-5.

This welcoming barn venue was constructed in 2015 on Yale Creek Ranch. This property has many acres to host your private event with lodging for 35+ guests also available. The venue itself has grand doors that open in both front & back to give your event an indoor/outdoor feel. Front entrance with 12 ft. bar area is the perfect place to host hors d'oeurves and beverage service. The venue also features a prep kitchen for your catering team to serve your exquisite faire. Add extra tents out the front and/or back to give plenty of space for you to say "I Do" with all of your favorite people. Tables and Chairs for 100 people, choice of wedding arch, parking assistant & on-site manager for day of needs all included with your rental. Plus so much more - Contact us today to schedule a tour!

Navarra Gardens on the river, is nestled in the beautiful coastal range of the rugged northwest Oregon Coast. Located 2 miles south of the little town of Willamina, 20 minutes drive west of McMinnville in the heart of wine country, and 25 minutes drive west of of Salem, and only a 1-½ hour drive from Portland. Our riverside and garden venue offers the quiet and comforts of the country, and convenience of location nearby bigger metropolitan areas. The entrance drive curves through beautiful fir trees with an undercover of summer blooming wildflowers and a variety of wild birds. manicured shrubs, pristine lawns, multiple water features and gardens. Navarra Gardens is 2024 Best of Willamette Valley event center winner. Many of our brides and grooms love the option to stay overnight at one of our on-property overnight accomodations. Navarra Gardens is exceptional for service and beauty.

WEDDINGS AT WHITE ASPEN Full Weddings Dependable service is at the foundation of every great White Aspen Creative event. Our dedicated and detail-oriented venue staff guarantee the success of your special occasion by providing personalized help that exceed expectations. White Aspen Creative elevates any event with a variety of options to perfectly complement your celebration. Bring in your chosen Vendors and Coordinator to create a special day just for you. We can help you create a custom layout or recommend a few great options for you. We have a large patio that can seat up to 75. With a large set of doors open to the venue to create an amazing indoor/outdoor flow. Our full wedding packages also include the night before, for rehearsal and rental drop offs, the day of, and part of the next day for rental pickups and final cleaning. Reach out to us today to book a tour of this unique Central Oregon Venue.

Located on the oceanfront at the stunning Cape Kiwanda on the Oregon Coast, and only two hours from Portland, Pelican Brewing is the perfect place for your most special day. Our fabulous location in Pacific City provides the memorable opportunity for you to say your vows on the beach, then take ten steps to our beautiful oceanfront banquet room. From an intimate reception for 40 guests to a large celebration of 80 guests, you can rely on the Pelican team to create the wedding day of your dreams. Relax and enjoy your day as every detail will be attended to by our professional and courteous staff. The award-winning kitchen can prepare meals from simple to extravagant, with the ability to customize menus to your taste and whimsy. Our in-house brewery has won awards all over the world, and can provide these fresh craft beers directly to your event. In addition, great wines and a full bar are available.

Discover a captivating venue that seamlessly blends breathtaking landscapes with exquisite wines and delectable cuisine. Choose from an array of enchanting locations for your ceremony and reception, including our private residence—a charming haven perfect for intimate gatherings or overnight stays. For larger celebrations, our expansive grounds offer a picturesque canvas to create memories that will last a lifetime. Immerse yourself in the beauty of our vineyards as you say "I do," then delight in a culinary journey tailored to your desires, expertly paired with our award-winning wines. Let us take care of every detail, from the stunning venue to the finest wines and delectable cuisine, ensuring your special day is an extraordinary celebration. Take the first step towards your perfect wedding day by reserving your spot at DANCIN Vineyards.

Hi, my name is Megan. I live in such a beautiful place on an incredible property that I am eager to share. The 3.5 acre property is nestled on a butte with natural fescue and sagebrush accented with manicured landscaping. The butte offers breathtaking views of the Cascade Mountains along with Smith Rock. Imagine taking your vows at sunset while gazing at the mountain surround. There are several ceremony locations the butte, large deck and patio. Along with the venue we also include accommodations to the couple for 2 nights. We offer an all inclusive package and options to add on photography/videography. With the all inclusive package I will coordinate and design your day to make it exactly how you imagined it. See my website for details

Vista 222 is located in the heart of Southern Oregon’s Applegate Valley. Nestled on a mountainside overlooking 70 acres of secluded and picturesque vineyard, Vista 222 is undeniably about the view. Our uniquely designed space can be easily transformed to fit the vision of your special day. From modern to classic or industrial to rustic, we've acquired the best of the best in amenities to ensure your day is memorable, stress-free, and that Vista is a place you want to return to. Our all-season venue is a favorite for corporate meetings and business parties, holiday parties, birthdays, anniversaries, wakes, weddings, and more! If you can dream it, our venue can help you bring it to life. We look forward to celebrating with you soon!

Black-owned open floor studio with large windows and original exposed brick. The large windows allow a hefty amount of natural sunlight to fill the room. Good for photo shoots, exercise classes, small banquets, birthday parties, baby showers, launch parties, and meeting space. There is a kitchenette with access to counters and sink however, no refrigerator access will be permitted. Elevator access from the street to allow easy loading and unloading. This is your premier and intimate event studio.

Nestled in the Pacific Northwest among the towering pine trees and Cascade Mountains, no wedding venue in the world captures the grandeur of the high desert quite like Sunriver Resort. With endless outdoor activities and resort amenities, Sunriver Resort is a vacation for everyone. From our premier spa and 63 holes of championship golf, to the finest and freshest Northwest cuisine, Sunriver Resort will keep all of your guests feeling relaxed and rejuvenated as they rejoice along with you. Explore nature’s stunning backdrops and our selection of tasteful venues as you consider entertaining your family and friends during your wedding weekend.

Welcome to Zesti Food Carts, where your wedding day becomes a culinary celebration like no other! Our unique venue is set within a lively food cart pavilion, featuring over 15 diverse food carts that offer a tantalizing range of international flavors. From savory street food to gourmet bites, our selection ensures a delightful dining experience for all your guests. We believe in pairing exceptional food with a memorable atmosphere. Our 30-tap beer and wine bar provides a curated selection of local brews and fine wines, perfect for toasting to your special moments. Choose between two stunning settings for your reception: the charming greenhouse, ideal for a romantic, garden-inspired ambiance, or our inviting live edge table-top area, located conveniently close to the bar for a more relaxed, industrial vibe. To further enhance your celebration, we offer a variety of customizable options, including candle, dish and flatware rentals and personalized lighting setups and open bar options.

There's just so much to love about these 28 secluded acres—rustic, welcoming buildings, a peaceful pond, trickling creeks, springs, meadows, and trails, all surrounded by forestland. Exchange vows in the perennial flower garden, then celebrate under the charming peeled log pavilion. Enjoy cocktails at the outdoor bar, or come up with an idea your hosts haven't seen yet. they love it when couples get creative! Enjoy your overnight stay in the cool glamping yurts, platform tents, and honeymoon cabin. Spend the day cycling the Banks-Vernonia State Trail, hiking, or playing lawn games, then gather around the fire pit at night reminiscing over s'mores.

Deepwood Museum and Gardens located in Salem, Oregon is an elegant outdoor venue consisting of several formal gardens with an 1894 Queen Anne Victorian home and Carriage House in the background. The manicured gardens create a lush fairytale setting for your wedding ceremony. An outdoor reception needs very little additional decor to complement its surroundings. Enjoy an evening with friends and family in the height of style. Deepwood provides you with a venue that is as effortless as it is beautiful. Invite your loved ones for an event that will be remembered for years to come.

Mount Pisgah Arboretum’s beautiful White Oak Pavilion is a 3,000 square foot building with large wooden glassed-in sliding doors that open on all sides to reveal the peaceful scenery and oak savannah landscapes of the Arboretum. The building is easily accessible to caterers, musicians, and guests. Photo opportunities at Mount Pisgah Arboretum include our vast Oak Savannah, the Great Meadows, large canopied forests, a lovely sandy beach along the Coast Fork River, the beautiful Adkison Footbridge in our Water Garden, our vintage, photogenic barn and over 200 acres of majestic trees, paths and nature. Mount Pisgah Arboretum is a non-profit organization and our main mission is education. Your wedding rental fee goes directly into our children's education program. This helps the Arboretum bring out over 3,000 school children each year to discover nature on our guided field trips. This park is open to the public 365 days a year.

Mt. Hood Meadows offers an all-inclusive experience for any season including gorgeous venues, custom seasonal menus, and recreational opportunities. We make it easy to plan a destination wedding, without having to travel far too far. Your guests will love getting out of the city for a fun and relaxing weekend. Make it a getaway for everyone! Wedding Facilities Sahale and Vertical Ballroom Dance the night away in our amazing new Sahale space. With a private attached deck, the space is perfect for an indoor/outdoor reception surrounded by breathtaking views. Or host your wedding in the inviting top floor of the lodge. A completely private space that features floor to ceiling windows, spanning over 140 feet. These panoramic views of the ski resort and Mt. Hood create a unique setting, almost like you are outdoors! You and your guests will admire the beauty of the mountain close up. Continue the celebration by dancing the night away in front of the built-in stage for your band or DJ!

Voted Oregon Wedding Day Magazine's Best Portland Wedding Venue in 2024! Centrally located just blocks from the Moda Center, Easton Broad is an industrial-chic, city venue perfect for the modern couple. While we lean into the greenhouse vibes, with a collection of over 100 houseplants, this intimate venue is a blank canvas that can accommodate groups from 20 to 200. Hire your dream team of vendors or ask us for our personalized recommendations! Need a little more space? We can help you obtain the permits necessary to utilize the sidewalk, right outside our doors, for cocktail hour overflow. This will allow much more flexibility for ceremony to reception "flips" with a higher guest count, and is also a great option for food trucks.

Welcome to Lakeside Gardens. Lakeside Gardens blends tall cedars, weeping willows, and lakes surrounded by a garden paradise. We are a Private Event Facility situated on 7 beautiful acres. We schedule events year-round. Our maximum capacity is 300 guests. Lakeside Gardens is both a beautiful and productive setting for every event. Evenings at Lakeside Gardens are gorgeous year round. At night, the grounds twinkle with lights lining the bridges and outlining the roof. White landscape lights encircle the lakes and charming outdoor lamps light your way for a romantic nighttime stroll.

With a regal red brick façade, the Chehalem Cultural Center is a fantastic choice for your dream wedding. Conveniently located in the heart of Newberg, the Center is steps away from fine restaurants, wineries, lodging and the historical downtown area. Housed in a newly renovated 1930's brick schoolhouse, the Chehalem Cultural Center offers an historic authenticity that is rare among today’s modern venues. Fully equipped with state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment and Wi-Fi, this flexible venue can accommodate up to 300 guests for a comfortable dining experience.

Ecotrust Events operates historical venues in flexible warehouse spaces where inclusivity, food, art, nature, and architecture come together to create rich sensory experiences. We use business as a force for good. We care about our environmental impact. We believe we have a role to play in creating a more just and equitable economy and supporting community through meaningful partnerships. All event rentals support Ecotrust's nonprofit work. OUR MISSION- Place matters. Your event location is a statement about who you are and what you value. Our unique spaces provide a stunning backdrop for your gathering, while supporting dynamic change in our community. We make you look good and feel good with our sustainability programs, eco-friendly guidelines and partnerships with local vendors only.

Elevate your event at the restored classic The Melody Event Center located in Central Eastside Portland. Built in 1925 and renovated in 2018 The Melody Event Center offers five distinct event spaces, accommodating up to 1,000 guests and offers flexible floor plans for every occasion. The elegant Melody Ballroom is nearly 6,000 square feet, welcoming up to 400 seated guest or up to 800 standing. The Melody Ballroom stands as our crown jewel with 30 foot high ceiling trimmed in gold, crystal chandeliers and a beautiful hardwood floor. We offer four additional spaces; The Morrison, Hawthorne, Portlandia and Broadway perfect for smaller events and meetings. Each room features this historic buildings original large scale windows displaying beautiful natural light. The Melody Event Center is a full service venue offering; onsite catering, offsite catering upon request, bar services, parking, A/V services, custom lighting, room setup, decoration packages and event planning.

Say “I Do” with the sun setting into the ocean and a bonfire warming your souls. Our oceanfront Sunset Gallery and other beautiful locations are available. Please contact our sales team for customized pricing. A full range of services and menus cater to pre-wedding celebrations, rehearsal dinners, wedding dinners, day-after wedding brunches, and more. And our pet-friendly policy allows every family member to take part in your celebration. We can create a customized environment, ensuring that every detail of your event meets Hallmark Resort Newport’s standard for hospitality, quality, and outstanding customer service.

This beautiful lodge, part of the Vial Family Farm, Scholls location is located amidst the working farm and family homes of an extended family that has become part of the fabric of the community of Scholls. Once the family home, the Lodge retains the spirit of family and gathering that is palpable to all who experience it. We sincerely hope that the information you find here will inspire a visit and ultimately an opportunity to enjoy this unique place.

You've found the perfect partner. Now it's time for the setting that conveys the grace and style you've always imagined for your wedding day. The Reserve Vineyards & Golf Club is the perfect venue for both your ceremony and reception. The Pavilion is situated on the wildflower-bordered patio adjacent to the 18th green of the North Course. This 4,800 square foot structure accommodates 250 guests. With sweeping golf course countryside views, the Vintner's Pavilion creates an elegant garden party atmosphere. The Crossing, situated in a lakeside, forest-like setting just steps from our striking chateau-style Clubhouse. At over 12,000 square feet. It's pristine location offers an unforgettable backdrop. On your wedding day, the only thing that matters is you! The Reserve's on-site wedding coordinator makes your vision come true. You choose all the elements that comprise the special character of your day. Give yourself, your fiancé, and your guests the wedding experience you deserve!

Centrally located in the heart of North Portland, The Baker Building is available to host your wedding, reception and ceremony. This historic building has been thoughtfully updated, keeping many of the original details while adding a modern touch. The building features a second floor ballroom with exposed rafters and hanging café lights, elegant hardwood flooring, and tons of natural light. A large kitchen and serving room is conveniently located just next to the ballroom as well as two private suits for guests. *All tables and chairs are included in the rental fee, surround sound PA system, wireless microphones and overhead projector. *We offer an open vendor policy which means that you may bring in outside caterers and alcohol for no additional fee.

At Villa Ragalie, you'll discover a relaxed yet vibrant event space perfect for any celebration. Enjoy scenic views and stunning fields, ideal for capturing that perfect golden hour photo! Our venue is versatile, hosting not just weddings but also retirements, birthdays, baby showers, and more. We are proudly LGBTQIA2S+ friendly, committed to providing a safe and welcoming space for everyone. Celebrate with us at Villa Ragalie and create unforgettable memories in a beautiful setting.

Eagles Nest Reserve is a family-run vineyard and winery focusing on dry farming, no-till, herbicide-free agriculture to produce un-fined and unfiltered, low intervention wine. ENR’s wines are low in sulfites and aim to express the authentic and rustic representation of its unique geology and microclimate. At approximately 600 ft elevation and the eastern-most area of the Tualatin Hills AVA, the vineyard is planted on wind-blown loess over basalt, and is influenced by catabatic winds funneled through the Columbia Gorge. The 160-acre reserve is a diverse and beautiful landscape of vineyards, wetlands, grazing alpacas, wildlife, and easement-protected forest sanctuaries. Surrounded by vines with a panoramic view of the valley, its showcase barn is host to wine tastings as well as public and private events. Contact us to host your wedding in this unbeatable setting just 15 miles from downtown Portland!

Nestled in the vibrant heart of SE Portland, our urban winery offers a unique and charming setting for your special day. Picture your celebration surrounded by the cozy elegance of our Barrel Room, where exposed wood barrels and rich, warm tones create an intimate and inviting atmosphere. The long Tasting Lounge provides the perfect space for mingling and toasting, with a stylish blend of rustic and modern elements. As you and your guests savor the moment, enjoy our handcrafted wines made right here on-site, complemented by a curated selection of imported wines and some of the finest Oregon beers on tap. Whether you're a wine enthusiast or a beer aficionado, our venue promises a memorable experience with exceptional beverages and a welcoming ambiance.

The Village Ballroom was established in 1909. If the handcrafted hardwood floors could talk, we would fill a library with stories from the gatherings and celebrations that have been shared within. The enchanting ballroom sits on the second story of the turn-of the-century building, and many of its historic features remain today, such as ornate radiators and milk glass light fixtures. Adjacent to the ballroom is a comfortable sitting lounge, as well as a bar/beverage service room. Every rental package includes use of our our tables and chairs, as well as our in-house sound system. With a 250-standing capacity and 130-sitting capacity, it can accommodate both intimate and large gatherings. The Village Ballroom welcomes all expressions of love and celebration, and will treat every client with respect and professionalism, offering clear communication and transparent policies from the initial inquiry process through event execution.

Tucked within a towering pine forest, FivePine Lodge offers a unique and serene wedding experience, locally sourced farm-to-table catering, and luxury craftsman-style cabins. Celebrate your special day next to our wildflower landscaped pond, or join your family and friends by the warm fireplace inside the Elda Teresa Event Center. The Ponderosa Pines offer a stunning backdrop for your ceremony, and our fully equipped indoor space allows you to design the reception of your dreams! We have a fantastic team of caring individuals who will work with you every step of the way. We would love to be a part of your memories!

Set amid an unexpected wooded haven in SW Portland, Nordia House embodies all the best in contemporary Nordic design. Natural materials blend with floor-to-ceiling windows to create beautiful, clean lines that reflect and enhance the stunning grounds. Nordic Northwest & Broder Söder Catering have a dedicated team to make your event a success. During the summer, the indoor areas may be augmented with three outdoor patios and an adjoining one-acre lawn area for less formal settings, making your options even more exciting.

Abbey Road Farm is the perfect venue for your celebrations & events up to 200 people. Choose from a number of locations, all with amazing views including the Silo Garden, the Parlor Garden or our Wedding Triangle that overlooks the Trappist Abbey itself. Also, our newly renovated Horse Riding Arena offers over 5,000 square feet of indoor space! Perfect for corporate gatherings, milestone celebrations, engagement parties, bridal showers, farm-to-table dinners, breathtaking ceremonies and receptions. We would be thrilled to help you create wonderful memories.

Designed to eloquently blend Parisian-inspired textures and tones with the 100+ year old warehouse, Tendue is a space that's both inviting and interesting. This fully furnished space has the capability to flex and creates the perfect setting for hosting small and mid-sized groups, workshops or most anything else. Photographers love the wall of north-facing windows that filter impeccable natural light throughout the entire day and the beautiful inventory of dinnerware and styling products help ensure dining is memorable and easy. Book the space and our event design team will be your partner in curating an individualized experience you’ll love.

The site of Risley Landing Gardens was held by the Risley family for over 100 years. In 1983, it was donated to the Oak Grove Garden Club by Hugh G. Starkweather (the grandson of Jacob S. Risley) and William Starkweather. William was the son of Harvey Starkweather, a prominent legislator and educator. Mr. Starkweather wanted the site to be a memorial park in honor of his mother and sisters. A bronze plaque dedicated to them is implanted on the wall of the Landing.

Find us right on the water’s edge of Siletz Bay at our newest Pelican Brewpub, located on the south end of picturesque Lincoln City. Discover an array of hosting options from our state-of-the-art Seaview Room to our expansive outdoor deck and more. Feel inspired by the serenity of Siletz Bay and treat your guests to locally crafted brews and delectable coastal cuisine. We offer a range of simple to extravagant menus, each designed by our classically trained chef using locally sourced ingredients whenever possible. Packages include cake-cutting services, assorted sodas, and all corkage fees.

Located in Yamhill, Oregon, Rebers Riverside is a barn and farm venue that hosts wedding celebrations. Nestled on the banks of the Yamhill River, this venue is set in the valley beneath Trask Mountain and boasts a backdrop of statuesque mountain scenery. Engaged couples may rent this property for the duration of an entire weekend to enjoy a private and intimate celebration with their guests. This spectacular farm is owned and operated by William and Brenda Reber, who celebrated their own wedding in the valley.

Built in 1852, the house sits on just under three acres and is surrounded by gardens and farm lands. Our gardens consist of heritage roses, perennial beds, and a large lawn with mature trees. Also included in the village is the Pioneer Mothers Memorial Cabin, an 1850’s one room schoolhouse and the historic Butteville Jail. The grounds of the complex make a charming backdrop for weddings providing a wonderful step back in time.

This site was first developed by Philip Foster in 1847, as a resting place on the Oregon Trail. It still has four original Foster buildings (two moved onto the site), including a large hay barn, granary, and two houses. One house has been restored to its 1860 condition. We welcome all kinds of weddings, but are most appreciated by those who love Oregon History, and those who want to bring horses to the wedding. There are many options for how to use our site, and we are happy to help you create your dream event. Although parking is limited to about 50 cars, there is plenty of space for people.

We've got options. Bar Carlo is a unique venue that has multiple spaces for mingling. Guests at the bar can spill out into the outdoor, covered space on our very wide sidewalk on a warm night while groups chat on our plush couches and others snack out of view. We even have a covered alley for overflow guests, kid's zone, smoking section, piñatas, dance party, you name it. With a full bar and kitchen, Bar Carlo is a perfect photo-ready relaxed steal.

Nestled on five acres, Country Willows is a unique oasis offering intimate weddings and elopement packages for UP TO 8 guests including couple. (Can be expanded to 24 with whole house rental of 9 rooms.) Located just outside the Ashland city limits in a relaxed and private setting, our beautiful grounds feature a koi waterfall pond, duck pond and stunning mountain views. It’s the perfect serene location to sharing your wedding vows. Country Willows staff recognizes the importance of your wedding day and has created an all-inclusive package to take the worry out of planning. We take care of all the details so you can enjoy your special day.

Lavender Owl Farm is a private and unique wedding venue that boasts 21 acres of wooded trails, lush greenery, mature trees, and picturesque flower gardens, offering endless wedding photo opportunities. It’s an intimate space ideal for celebrating your big day with your closest friends and family. Canby, located just 45 minutes south of Portland, is known as the ‘Garden Spot’ of Oregon, surrounded by stunning farmland, beautiful parks, and iconic tourist attractions. With our many in-house services and experienced and trusted staff and partners to complete your day of team, we can perfect your day saving you time, money, and stress! And, if you love some DIY, we can help you there too! With our expertise and attention to detail, you can trust that your event will be a success from start to finish.

Holocene is a unique venue for weddings and receptions — a soaring, modern space with a clean, contemporary mood, endless flexibility, a full-range of amenities, and a dedicated staff. The lofty white spaces, big windows, warm wood, and cozy lighting provide a great backdrop — the space looks wonderful with just a few brought flowers, or can harmonize with a more elaborate scheme. The distinct areas of the space let Holocene work perfectly as a combination ceremony and reception venue, in any season. We have a stable of excellent caterers, floral designers, rental companies, DJs, and musicians to recommend, or, you’re very welcome to bring your own. We have a big stage (and amazing sound system), a DJ booth (and gear, and moving lights and video and haze), a photobooth, dressing rooms, a kitchen and gorgeous full bar (with slushies cocktails, great draft beers…) — all included in the rental. Please get in touch if you’d like to discuss possibilities - including live streaming events!

Trout Creek Wilderness Lodge is a stunning wedding venue in the wilderness of Molalla, Oregon. Situated in the Cascade Mountain Range, the property is surrounded by one of the country’s last old-growth forests. A place of serene calm, guests are invited to freely wander its 200-acres of beautifully-conserved land and connect with nature. Despite its secluded location, the venue is nevertheless convenient and accessible. An hour’s drive from Portland, it is also well-served by the city’s International Airport, allowing guests from around the world to experience the magic of the Northwest. We can host single-day weddings, but to best experience the magic of the land, we suggest you book for a multi-day experience, and have a unique luxury camping adventure with your guests! We have Sleeping Spaces for up to 19 people in the Rainy Season, and up to 100 people in the Sunny Season, including our deluxe canvas Bell Tents! BYO tent and RV sites increase capacity to 120.

The ranch provides access to the stunning countryside setting of the Smith Rock area. We offer memorable ranch adventures such as private events, weddings, and more. We believe in promoting a strong local community and hosting annual events. With a petting zoo, pony and hayrides, weddings, and a month-long pumpkin patch, DD Ranch is fun for everyone. Join us any time you’d like to slow down and celebrate life. We love creating fun memorable experiences for all to share and treasure

The Hood River Hotel is a historic property in the heart of Hood River’s downtown, offering 41 guest rooms and a 10 bed hostel. Built in 1911 and on the National Register of Historic Places the Hood River Hotel is the place to stay in the Columbia River Gorge. We are in the center of downtown nestled amidst local artisan shops, eateries, wineries, brew pubs and a myriad of outdoor adventure destinations. Enjoy food and drink from our Scandinavian inspired Broder Ost or chill in our lobby in front of the fireplace with a local craft beer.

The city’s original, locally-owned boutique since 2004, the Jupiter Hotel recently expanded with the newly built Jupiter NEXT. Every space at The Jupiter offers an opportunity to creatively curate the Portland wedding experience meant for you. Rich outdoor lushness to a modern industrial ballroom, a secret garden and an urban oasis - our spaces transform to be uniquely your own. From rehearsal dinners to post-wedding brunches - we love our Portland couples. Let our experts help your imaginary vision become your dream reality

Our resort is right on the Oregon Coast, just a few feet from the ocean. The wedding venue is just 20 ft. from the "Sand" and after a beautiful outside wedding and indoor reception at the hotel ballroom, your guests can continue having fun at the casino which is just across the hotel parking area from where we have our weddings.

The Beacon-Seaside is a spacious venue, which turned 100 years old in 2020. It is located in the heart of downtown Seaside, Oregon, underwent a 5 and a half year transformation. The renovation was completed in 2019. The original floor was preserved, creating warmth and elegance to enhance your special event. You'll be a close walk to the beach, just 4 and a half blocks away. Many hotels, restaurants, and other attractions are near. We offer catering and bar options as well as set up and clean up for additional costs.

Welcome to The Locks Venue, an enchanting oasis nestled within the historic splendor of the Columbia Gorge. Steeped in rich heritage and natural beauty, our venue offers a captivating setting for unforgettable moments and timeless celebrations. At the heart of The Locks Venue lies our picturesque island, a hidden gem awaiting discovery. This secluded sanctuary serves as the perfect backdrop for intimate wedding ceremonies, where couples can exchange vows surrounded by the tranquil beauty of the Columbia River. With panoramic views of the gorge cliffs and the gentle flow of the river as your soundtrack, your island ceremony at The Locks Venue promises to be an unforgettable experience. At The Locks Venue, we invite you to embark on a journey through time and nature, where history meets elegance, and every moment is infused with beauty. Come and discover the wonder of the Columbia Gorge with us and let The Locks Venue be the canvas for your most cherished memories.

Calling all adventure lovers, outdoor enthusiasts, and nature aficionados! Looking for a truly unique wedding location for your special day? Want to showcase the beauty of the PNW to your out-of-town guests? Look no further! Come say your "I Dos" at 4,000 ft. elevation with Mt. Hood in the backdrop! From wildflowers to scenic mountain vistas, Skibowl is a one-of-a-kind, FUN venue, offering an array of services and accommodations for your wedding guests. After arriving to your reception mountain-style (aka Alpine Slide), dance the night away under the stars (and twinkly lights, of course) on the outdoor patio, adjacent to your Reception Tent. Keep the festivities going all weekend long, from surrounding area hikes, to paddle boarding Trillium Lake, to hosting a post-wedding brunch the morning after. From a seasoned catering team to an onsite day of coordinator, you'll be in good hands at Skibowl, with lots of guidance along the way!

Opening to the public in 2006, The Water Oasis was a small wedding venue in the heart of Oregon wine country that hosted limited events each year. In February of 2012, the family made the decision to grow from a small operation to a larger scale, full time Wedding & Event Center. This meant bringing all operations and management back into the family to be 100% family owned and operated! With new management, renewed inspiration and a great deal of PASSION, The Water Oasis had a spectacular Grand Re-Opening year in 2012.

It's like summer camp--only better. Our lodge, historic cabins, and campus are set aside exclusively for you and your friends and family --all gathering for a weekend of adventure and relaxation at Lake Creek Lodge. Splash in the creek, hike the trails, throw the ball for the pup, fish the river, sip wine on the deck, break out the lawn games, run amuck, laugh, play, and enjoy our 42-acre property for the entire weekend. You will choose from our nine stunning venue sites to host your ceremony and reception, and you will have exclusive use of the Lodge’s dining room and covered deck on Friday evening for your rehearsal dinner. All weekend long you will have access to our sport courts, seasonal swimming pool, yard games, creek, trails, and open spaces. We’ll provide the vibe, you’ll provide the vision. Your wedding weekend lodging minimum secures our 14 historic cabins, with the option of adding up to 8 luxury cabins--giving you semi-exclusive or exclusive use of our campus.

Bridge Over Clear Creek is a beautiful destination for your special day! We offer many amenities to ensure your day is just perfect. Our venue is on private land where you will find peace and tranquility. Please call us today to set up a time to tour this wonderful property. A special wedding venue in Estacada, Oregon, Bridge Over Clear Creek is a beautiful outdoor landscape for your perfect wedding celebration. The venue is an ideal, private location, miles away from the city and nestled in a canopy of trees with scenic views.

At Riverhouse natural beauty surrounds with volcanic rock and old-growth Ponderosa Pine trees. Exchange vows on the Cascade Garden overlooking the Deschutes or choose from the beautiful Northwest contemporary styled indoor spaces. From intimate ceremonies to lavish large dream wedding receptions we can bring your dreams to life. Our professional staff is here to help every step of the way with a focus on you, your special day and memories you will take away for a lifetime.

Heceta Head is one of the most beautiful lighthouses in the world! The Lighthouse and Light Keeper’s home are circa 1894. Both are listed on the National Register of Historic Places. From a height of 205 feet above the ocean, its “first order” Fresnel lens, casts it’s beams some 21 miles out to sea. It is the brightest light on the Oregon coast. It is said to be the most photographed lighthouse in the United States. The Light Keeper’s home is perched on a cliff with a magnificent view of the Pacific Ocean and the beach below. Paths from the Light Keeper’s Home lead both to the beach and to the lighthouse. Very special couples have chosen the Heceta Lighthouse B&B as their wedding destination and we are happy that you are considering us for your special day. It is a home where family and friends can feel comfortable and relaxed. Each wedding we have experienced has been unique. We appreciate each family’s diversity and look forward to joining in your celebration!

The Sanctuary Hall is a stunning, historical landmark in the heart of Portland's Arts District. Step back into time as you bask in the warm glow of 30' hand-made Povey Brothers stained glass installations and run your fingertips along the hand-carved 130 year old Douglas-Fir pews. The Hall's rounded and layered design allows for every wedding to feel like an intimate affair, be it seven people or 700. Beneath the Sanctuary Hall are many more multi-use rooms, including a banquet hall, commercial kitchen, chapel library, multiple dressing rooms. The venue is equipped with modern sound, lighting, and video capturing and streaming equipment. We have a fully functional pipe organ, one of the largest in Oregon, and a 7' Steinway Grand piano at your disposal. As an all-inclusive venue, we include staffing, setup, use of rentals (tables, chairs, linens, etc), clean-up, and an event specialist team to assist you with every package!

Welcome to The Hummingbird Hall, a hidden gem nestled in the heart of Springdale, OR. Housed within a meticulously restored historic 1914 chapel, our venue seamlessly combines timeless charm with modern sophistication. Whether you're seeking a romantic wedding venue, an intimate space for a class or meeting, a distinctive setting for corporate events, or a fun site for your family holiday gathering, The Hummingbird Hall offers a truly unforgettable experience in this cherished piece of Springdale and Corbett's heritage.

We offer 45 historic acres of pasture surrounded by old-growth trees located on the Barlow Road, a section of the Oregon Trail. An 1890 Victorian Farm House, big red barn, and the Clackamas River make this a special place for your wedding or event. This unique property sits down in a valley with almost 1/2 mile of river frontage. Huge old-growth trees surround the fields. Total privacy with pastoral views. We allow our clients plenty of time to plan and celebrate. We look forward to meeting you.

Thank you for considering The Point for such a special day in your life. The Point offers the most spectacular views of the southern Oregon coast. We will make every attempt to make sure that your special day fulfills your wishes. Because The Point is a site of historical significance there are restrictions on the use of the property. Working with your wedding planner we will make sure that those restrictions are met and your expectations for your special day are met. We hire extra staff to make sure that all restrictions on property use are followed.

Pacifica: A Garden in the Siskiyous, offers a very special setting for your wedding. With 500 acres of conserved land in the beautiful Williams/Applegate Valley, we offer you the use of both outdoor and indoor facilities for your ceremony and reception. The Wedding Garden, Pacifica’s outdoor site, overlooks a large pond and meadow. This site has three grassed tiers for chairs with a beautiful view of Grayback Mountain. The indoor site, our large and welcoming climate-controlled (heat, a/c, smoky air filtered) Great Hall, has hardwood floors for dancing. It also has a spectacular floor-to-ceiling 16 foot wide roll up glass door that allows you to still feel as if you are outdoors, even in colder weather. The Great Hall holds up to 150-200 people; the lovely covered pavilion just outside the door can hold another 100. Changing rooms for bride and groom, a small prep kitchen and large indoor, handicap-accessible restrooms are also available here.

Family Owned and Operated! The Jamestown Ranch is a vast 200-acre ranch that has been Redland staple throughout the years. Nestled amongst the acres of hay fields and forests sits the original farmhouse that currently functions as a full time vacation rental sleeping 10. Come stay with us and enjoy the horses along other farm animals in the petting zoo, in a quiet country setting. For weddings and events we supply tables, chairs, additional premium restrooms, dance floor and more all included in our weekend pricing! We also offer day of coordinating to make it even easier to have the perfect day! We just want couples to have fun and leave with a weekend full of memories for not only themselves but for every one of their guests.

Chateau Lesieutre, perched atop the Dundee Hills, in a secluded five-acre setting, invites you to experience our spacious and charming home. A picturesque four-mile drive from the town of Dundee takes you past vineyards, wineries, and tasting rooms, offering breathtaking scenery and panoramic views.​​ The Guest House is an ideal retreat for exploring nearby wineries while also offering a perfect venue for hosting small events. From intimate gatherings to once-in-a-lifetime celebrations, Chateau Lesieutre provides serenity and charm in an idyllic old-world country setting. Centrally located in the heart of the Willamette Valley, it serves as a convenient base for further explorations and adventures in this world-renowned wine region and other nearby Oregon attractions. ​Come and discover the beauty and tranquility of Chateau Lesieutre Guest House, where every moment becomes a cherished memory.

Located in the heart of downtown and close to the University of Oregon campus, Graduate Eugene is the ideal venue for your next celebration. With 30,000 square feet of flexible event space, the hotel offers a variety of distinct settings to host groups of up to 1,800 guests. At Graduate Eugene, nods to the Pacific Northwest and track-and-field mingle with original art and vintage touches to create an original setting for your event. For functions large and small, our creative events and culinary teams will work with you to customize a memorable experience that perfectly suits your gathering.

Saint Irene's is named after the owner's late mother, a seamstress for Jantzen swimwear. Much like the revolutionary company she worked for, Irene was a strong, hardworking mother of 7 who dedicated her life to others. Saint Irene's High Dive + Event Venue is our family's way of continuing her legacy of love and hospitality, offering the opportunity for groups to gather. Come join us at Saint Irene's and partake in making new memories over food and drink.

The Columbia Gorge Sternwheeler embodies the rich history and romantic allure of river travel along the majestic Columbia River. This iconic paddlewheel riverboat offers a captivating journey through the stunning Columbia River Gorge, showcasing breathtaking vistas of towering cliffs, lush forests, and cascading waterfalls. Additionally, the Columbia Gorge Sternwheeler offers a picturesque setting for intimate gatherings, rehearsal dinners, wedding receptions, and small weddings, where couples can exchange vows against the backdrop of panoramic river views, creating memories to cherish for a lifetime. The Sternwheeler provides a romantic and unforgettable venue for couples seeking a truly special and intimate celebration of their love.

Congratulations on your engagement! We at Portland Spirit Cruises & Events would be honored to help make your wedding day truly unforgettable. With our fleet of three unique vessels, you can enjoy a one-of-a-kind experience for your engagement party, rehearsal dinner, or elegant ceremony and reception. Our all-inclusive wedding packages make planning stress-free, so you can focus on enjoying your special day. Choose from our flagship vessel, the Portland Spirit, accommodating up to 250-450 guests, the Willamette Star, accommodating up to 100-120 guests, or the luxurious Crystal Dolphin, accommodating up to 50-80 guests. All packages include three hours of private cruising time, Pacific Northwest cuisine prepared fresh on board, a Captain's ceremony, a Champagne toast, white linens, sound system, and service charge. We have been helping couples sail into happily ever after since 1994, and we'd love to help you too. Book your wedding today!
